"Schraft": "You there! That's a fine look in your eyes. Those are the eyes of an ARKS warrior."

"そこのキミ、良い目をしているな。
戦うアークスの目だ。"
"I have things to teach you, but you should first focus on increasing your strength."
"Hey, there you are. I've been waiting for you."

"やぁ、よく来たな。
キミが来るのを待っていたよ。"
"I have some things to teach you about fighting as an ARKS. Do you have a moment?"

"キミにアークスの戦いかたについて教えたいのだが、
少し時間をもらえるか？"
"Those Battle Triggers I gave you are for the Yellow Portal in Aelio."
"Aelio's Yellow Portal is in Western Aelio. Now go and show me what you're made of!"
